column4: how do I execute this command automatically every time my system boots? modprobe usbserial vendor=0x05c6 product=0x6539
no need to do that edit /etc/modprobe.d/usb_serial_opt.conf file and add a line that says « options usbserial vendor=0x05c6 product=0x6539 »
the file can have the name you want
but it has to end in .conf :)
